articles.description: "To be honest, I don't think India is a very crypto-friendly environment," said Binance CEO Changpeng "CZ" Zhao.
articles.content: Scores of crypto-focused venture capital firms have raced to India in the past two years, hoping to turn the world’s second largest internet market’s large developer community into a key web3 power h… [+3060 chars]
